results.title: The effect of a one-year weight reduction program on serum uric acid in overweight/obese children and adolescents.
results.text_hl: Of these, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment, baseline sUA, and DeltaBMI% were independent predictors of @<m>DISEASE_Serum_Sickness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012713 @@@sUA reduction@@@, explaining 77% of data variability.

citations.NLM: Krzystek-Korpacka M, Patryn E, Kustrzeba-Wojcicka I, Chrzanowska J, Gamian A, Noczynska A. The effect of a one-year weight reduction program on serum uric acid in overweight/obese children and adolescents. Clin Chem Lab Med. 2011 May;49(5):915-21. PMID: 21288171
